heading: Today
text: Patchy fog burning off to sun, a few high clouds.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mainly clear, some high clouds. Patchy valley fog, and scattered frost.
temperature: 30s to near 40, 30 in the cold spots

heading: Friday
text: Patchy valley fog early, mainly east, then mostly sunny.

heading: Saturday
text: Mostly sunny after any early fog.
